sentences.english: Strengthening the construction of agricultural infrastructure, and enhancing the capacity of combating disaster and ensuring production.
sentences.chinese: 加強農業基礎設施建設，增強農業抗災保產能力。

sentences.english: The research shows that the aerial shrub species have strong component against disasters.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，飛播灌木林樹種組成具有很強的抗災性。

sentences.english: Fourth, carefully carry out emergency exercises to enhance the level of mine disaster prevention and resilience.
sentences.chinese: 四是認真開展應急演練活動，提升礦井防災抗災水平。

sentences.english: Tenth, attaching importance to flood-control and disaster-relief work.
sentences.chinese: 第十，切實抓好防訊抗災工作。

sentences.english: Leaders of the school have organized teachers and students to conduct self-rescue against the earthquake, thus the school is in well order now.
sentences.chinese: 學校領導正積極組織師生抗災自救，學校秩序良好。

sentences.english: The crisis mangement of disaster does not follow automatically from disaster planning.
sentences.chinese: 災難危急時刻的管理往往是出乎於原有的抗災計劃的。

sentences.english: The construction of disaster combat and relief materials reserve network, at central and local levels, will be strengthened;
sentences.chinese: 加強中央和地方抗災救災物資儲備網絡建設。

sentences.english: We promptly took steps to carry out disaster relief work and rebuild disaster-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 我們及時部署加強抗災救災和災後重新修建工作。

definition: to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to review a judicial case/to reexamine
